[code]Updates Update [12/19] 1. Recovery Questions have now been added into the game for use of recovering your account! 2. The Security Stronghold is part of the Recovery Questions. 3. You can now buy/sell with money pouch in shops.
Update [12/16]
SerenityUS will currently keep updating their advertisment posts of this time. Here was have been changed onto the server.
1. A new developer has joined the Serenity ranks. Congratulations to him. 2. The Hunter Skilling Shop has been redone and relocated at Yanille [Where all skilling shops are located] 3. The Max Cape is still being edited and currently is not obtainable as of now (currently changed to a total skill number of 2398
Hoping on seeing you in the next update![/code]

[code]Updates
Update [12/19]

  1. Recovery Questions have now been added into the game for use of recovering your account!
  2. The Security Stronghold is part of the Recovery Questions.
  3. You can now buy/sell with money pouch in shops.

Update [12/16]

SerenityUS will currently keep updating their advertisment posts of this time. Here was have been changed onto the server.

  1. A new developer has joined the Serenity ranks. Congratulations to him.
  2. The Hunter Skilling Shop has been redone and relocated at Yanille [Where all skilling shops are located]
  3. The Max Cape is still being edited and currently is not obtainable as of now (currently changed to a total skill number of 2398

Hoping on seeing you in the next update![/code]
